definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: Hello, long time no see. How are you doing?
sentences.chinese: 你好，好久不見。你怎麼樣？

sentences.english: Ann, long time no see. Where were you going?
sentences.chinese: 安，好久不見，你去了哪裏？

sentences.english: Maybe you have a boyfriend or girlfriend that you haven't seen in a long time.
sentences.chinese: 也許你已經好久不見你的男朋友或者女朋友了。

sentences.english: It's been a long time, Mrs. Lee.
And you know, sometimes you run into people that you haven't seen in a while, so it's nice.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，有時候你碰上一些好久不見的人，這很好。

sentences.english: He smiled, and circled around the group. “Long time no see.
sentences.chinese: 他微笑着說，摟住了她們兩個，“好久不見。

sentences.english: Yang Guang, long time no see. What on earth have you been doing these days?
sentences.chinese: 楊光，好久不見。這些天你究竟在做什麼？

sentences.english: Laotian, long time no see. Where are you going?
sentences.chinese: 老田，好久不見你了，你到哪裏去了？

sentences.english: The second section, disappears for a long time the old schoolmate, crosses fortunately?
sentences.chinese: 第二段，好久不見了老同學，過的還好嗎？

definition: (final particle equivalent to 了[le5])/(particle calling attention to, or mildly warning of, a situation)
unworthy/to let down/I'm sorry/excuse me/pardon me/if you please/sorry? (please repeat)
to do sth more quickly/Hurry up!/Get a move on!
to cherish the memory of/to think of/reminisce
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
